Summary: Payment button returns 500 error on mobile checkout
Description: Users on iOS and Android are receiving a 500 server error when clicking the payment button at checkout. Reproducible on Safari and Chrome mobile. Started after deploy on Jan 30.

Summary: Mobile app crashes on file upload over 5MB
Description: Android app crashes immediately when user attempts to upload any file larger than 5MB. No error message shown to user. Crash log attached.

Summary: Password reset emails landing in Gmail spam
Description: Users with Gmail accounts are not receiving password reset emails in inbox â€” found in spam. SPF/DKIM records may need updating.
Users with large accounts report dashboard taking 8-12 seconds to load. Query optimization needed on the projects list endpoint.
Email notification settings do not persist. Users report having to disable notifications repeatedly as they re-enable themselves daily.

Summary: Billing page error on plan downgrade
Description: Users who attempt to downgrade their subscription plan receive a generic error and cannot complete the action. Workaround requires manual intervention from support.

Summary: CSV export for all data tables
Description: Multiple customers and prospects have requested the ability to export any data table to CSV. Currently export is only available on the reports page. Sales reports this as a frequent demo blocker.
Enterprise prospects require Single Sign-On support. Three enterprise deals blocked this month due to lack of SSO. Requested for Okta and Azure AD specifically.
Community forum has 47 upvotes on dark mode request. Growing demand from power users who work in low-light environments.
Users struggle to find how to invite teammates. Current flow requires navigating to Settings > Organization > Members > Invite. Recommend surfacing invite option on dashboard.
Onboarding checklist state is stored in memory only. Users who close the browser lose all progress and must restart onboarding. Needs server-side persistence.
Current search requires exact keyword match. Users report frustration when searching for items with slight spelling variations. Implement fuzzy matching with Elasticsearch or similar.
